My collection of rocks and minerals calms me down.

participant_2.background:
My favorite websites are the ones that help me learn about skiing and the mountains.
i came from japan to teach high school over 10 years ago.
I miss my father every day.
I'm afraid of my mom coming back into my life and ruining my new life.
i am one of four siblings.

content.text: Good, I'm a little nervous. My mom is going to be coming back into my life soon and I'm not sure how that will go
Oh no, I'm sorry to hear that. What's the reason for her coming back into your life?
She's been out of my life for over 10 years now. She left my dad and I when I was very young and I haven't seen her since
Wow, that must have been very hard for you. I'm glad to hear that you're dad was there for you
Yeah, he's always been there for me. He's my best friend.
I'm sure he's proud of the person you've become
Thanks, I think he is too. I'm a teacher now and I love my job.
That's great! I'm sure you're a great teacher
I teach high school. It can be a lot of work, but it's also really rewarding
I bet it is. I'm sure you have a lot of interesting stories
I do! I could talk about teaching all day long
I'd love to hear some of them sometime
Maybe we can grab coffee sometime and I can tell you some
That sounds like fun! I'd love tha
